Public NotInheritable Class TableColumnCollection Implements ICollection(Of TableColumn), IEnumerable(Of TableColumn), IList, IList(Of TableColumn)

public ref class TableColumnCollection sealed : System::Collections::Generic::ICollection<System::Windows::Documents::TableColumn ^>, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::Windows::Documents::TableColumn ^>, System::Collections::Generic::IList<System::Windows::Documents::TableColumn ^>, System::Collections::IList

summary.span: 提供标准功能，用于创建和管理 对象的类型安全的有序集合。

span.span: Provides standard facilities for creating and managing a type-safe, ordered collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此集合支持标准的从零开始索引。This collection supports standard zero-based indexing. 由提供属性类返回。The property provided by the class returns a . 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 操作通过属性列的表的列](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-manipulate-table-columns-through-the-columns-property.md)。For more information, see [How to: Manipulate a Table's Columns through the Columns Property](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-manipulate-table-columns-through-the-columns-property.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public int Capacity { get; set; }
.property instance int32 Capacity
Public Property Capacity As Integer
public: property int Capacity { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置为此集合预先分配的集合项容量。

span.span: Gets or sets the pre-allocated collection item capacity for this collection.

value.span: 为此集合预先分配的集合项容量。

span.span: The pre-allocated collection item capacity for this collection.
The default value is **8**.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示在此集合中存储项的预分配槽的数量，而属性表示集合中当前项的实际数目。The property represents the number of pre-allocated slots for storing items in this collection, whereas the property represents the actual number of items currently in the collection. 值始终是至少一样大的值作为。The value of is always at least as large as the value of . 如果新添加的集合项导致集合计数超过集合容量，则容量是自动增大以容纳新添加的集合项。When newly added collection items cause the collection count to exceed the collection capacity, the capacity is automatically increased to accommodate the newly added collection items. 增加集合容量包括分配其他集合槽，这会产生性能和内存开销。Increasing the collection capacity involves allocating additional collection slots, which incurs both performance and memory overhead. 使用属性来优化在集合项的总值或最大数目提前知道的情况下的集合容量。Use the property to optimize the collection capacity in cases where the total or maximum number of collection items is known in advance. 使用方法，使集合容量等于当前的集合计数。Use the method to cause the collection capacity to equalized with the current collection count.

exception.span: 当尝试将 设置为小于 的当前值的值时引发。

span.span: Raised when an attempt is made to set to a value that is less than the current value of .

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Clear() cil managed
Public Sub Clear ()
public: virtual void Clear();

summary.span: 清除集合中的所有项。

span.span: Clears all items from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用的值属性变为**0**和的值属性保持不变。After calling , the value of the property becomes **0** and the value of the property is unchanged. 若要设置新的容量，调用或显式设置通过新容量属性。To set a new capacity, call or explicitly set a new capacity through the property.

.method public hidebysig instance void TrimToSize() cil managed
Public Sub TrimToSize ()
public: void TrimToSize();

summary.span: 通过将基础集合 设置为等于集合中当前项的 来优化集合的内存占用。

span.span: Optimizes memory consumption for the collection by setting the underlying collection equal to the of items currently in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此方法以最小化内存开销对于集合，尤其是如果集合包含的项集的预期为静态。This method can be used to minimize memory overhead for a collection, particularly if the set of items contained by the collection is expected to be static.
